survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from attendees of the annual Professional Development Conference to evaluate session quality, logistics, and overall satisfaction for future improvements.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall quality of the conference sessions?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly display.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice radio buttons. Mandatory question.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall quality of the conference sessions?

questions.question_text: Which of the following session topics were most valuable to you? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-selection to capture diverse interests. Randomize option order to reduce bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes. Include 'Other' with open-text option.

script.question_text: Which of the following session topics were most valuable to you? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What aspects of the conference logistics could be improved?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture detailed feedback. Limit response to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text input with character counter.

script.question_text: What aspects of the conference logistics could be improved?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this conference to colleagues?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple single-choice scale for clear benchmarking.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice radio buttons. Include 'Prefer not to say' option.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this conference to colleagues?

questions.question_text: What additional topics would you like to see covered in future conferences?
questions.client_notes: Encourage creativity with a free-text response. Optional question.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text input. Optional field.

script.question_text: What additional topics would you like to see covered in future conferences?
